Articles.Content:
Hey guys and gals,

Is there a way to filter the entire member list by oldest members, I noticed mine was Sept 2011 after someone mentioned 2013 as 'being old' ha in a thread so I wondered who were the oldest members.

Cheers Kosmonauts!
I think if you go far back enough there may have been some forum wipes and crashes, but I'm guessing Harvester.

> 
> Is there a way to filter the entire member list by oldest members

I'm in my 40s, does that count?

(that's what I thought about when I saw the thread title)

> 
> I'm in my 40s, does that count?
> (that's what I thought about when I saw the thread title)

That's what I thought too. Not that you were 40, but that this was about who's actually the oldest KSP player in years.

There is a way.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/memberlist.php?s=&sort=joindate](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/memberlist.php?s=&sort=joindate)

Should work.

Hum, for someone that is here before the devs, Jeb definitely does not post a lot ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) And that rep level ... ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

If you look at a user's profile, you might notice that the URL for the page contains a number. That account number started at 2 and went up from there, so by changing that number you can see who joined earliest. I am member #12687, fwiw.

Edit: Oooh, hermes' link is even better, nice find.
Im one of the oldest lol
There appears to be this mysterious user called alejandro from all the way back to 0.8.5, judging from his posts.

I remember 0.8.5

all i tried to do then was go as fast as i can

> 
> There appears to be this mysterious user called alejandro from all the way back to 0.8.5, judging from his posts.

Curiouser and curiouser... It seems he was born three years after joining the forums. Well, I guess starting early is always good!

> 
> Curiouser and curiouser... It seems he was born three years after joining the forums. Well, I guess starting early is always good!

Huh, while everyone *should* lie about their birthdate online... it seems strange that the forum allowed him to enter a future birthdate... is it possible that it just doesn't know the year and is guessing 2014?
It is more likely that the Field has been reset at some point >> My Birth date seems to have been erroneously set to 2014.
I think there may be a few who have been playing the game for some time before joining this forum.

A lot of the earliest posters aren't around any longer. It's actually kind of sad, going back through the earliest forum posts. I recognize the old usernames and remember them posting, and find myself wondering when it was they stopped posting.

EDIT: Yep, there I am on page 355 of 4713. Meaning that, even if my accouint is #10,659, it's still one of the first.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T23:50:30Z" title="04/28/2015 11:50  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by SkyRender**

> 
> A lot of the earliest posters aren't around any longer. It's actually kind of sad, going back through the earliest forum posts. I recognize the old usernames and remember them posting, and find myself wondering when it was they stopped posting.

I just went through the first few pages myself, and had the same experience. I spent a fair bit of time away from the community and have just started to come back, and I feel like everything's changed now, for better or worse.

Back in my day... 

User # 3838 according to the URL ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Never paid attention to my join date...now I will ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> I just went through the first few pages myself, and had the same experience. I spent a fair bit of time away from the community and have just started to come back, and I feel like everything's changed now, for better or worse.
> Back in my day... 
> 
> User # 3838 according to the URL ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

same month as you yea im 1764
I think I'm the oldest member. I mean, it's been almost a month already.
Just look at date of when person join forum probably same day they buy game. So you will know how old they are
I'm number 37119.
My profile should be showing up as late 2012-early 2013, Damn you forum crash!
I wonder why i wasnt effected by the crash

> 
> I wonder why i wasnt effected by the crash

Same reason why any of us who registered before a certain point in 2012 weren't: we registered before the last date of the database backup that they restored the forums from.
Define "oldest". I've been playing the game since mid-2012. But only created my forum account last year.
